intro: Macrocarpaea quechua, commonly known as the Andean macrocarpaea, is a flowering plant native to the high-altitude regions of the Andes in South America. Macrocarpaea quechua is valued for its ornamental appeal and is sometimes cultivated in gardens in temperate climates.
